Constants

List all constants

PPU
PPU registers
PPU_CTRL

$2000 PPU Control register address

PPU_MASK

$2001 PPU Mask register address

PPU_STATUS

$2002 PPU Status register address

PPU_SCROLL

$2005 PPU Scroll register address

PPU_ADDR

$2006 PPU Addr register address

PPU_DATA

$2007 PPU Data register address

OAMDMA

$4014 OAM DMA register address

PPU Mask register flags
PPU_MASK_GREY

%00000001 Render as grayscale

PPU_MASK_BKG8

%00000010 Display background in leftmost 8 pixels

PPU_MASK_SPR8

%00000100 Display sprites in leftmost 8 pixels

PPU_MASK_BKG

%00001000 Display background

PPU_MASK_SPR

%00010000 Display sprites

PPU_MASK_R

%00100000 Emphasize red

PPU_MASK_G

%01000000 Emphasize green

PPU_MASK_B

%10000000 Emphasize blue

PPU Control register flags
PPU_CTRL_NM_0

%00000000 PPU nametable 0 (top left)

PPU_CTRL_NM_1

%00000001 PPU nametable 1 (top right)

PPU_CTRL_NM_2

%00000010 PPU nametable 2 (bottom left)

PPU_CTRL_NM_3

%00000011 PPU nametable 3 (bottom right)

PPU_CTRL_INC

%00000100 Increment VRAM address by 32

PPU_CTRL_SPR

%00001000 Sprite pattern table address

PPU_CTRL_BKG

%00010000 Background pattern table address

PPU_CTRL_SPR_SIZE

%00100000 8*16 Sprite size

PPU_CTRL_SEL

%01000000 PPU Master/Slave select

PPU_CTRL_NMI

%10000000 Generate an NMI at the start of the Vblank

PPU Nametable addresses
PPU_NAMETABLE_0

$2000

PPU_NAMETABLE_1

$2400

PPU_NAMETABLE_2

$2800

PPU_NAMETABLE_3

$2C00

APU
APU start address

$4000

APU square 1 channel registers
APU_SQ1_VOL

$4000

APU_SQ1_SWEEP

$4001

APU_SQ1_LO

$4002

APU_SQ1_HI

$4003

APU square 2 channel registers
APU_SQ2_VOL

$4004

APU_SQ2_SWEEP

$4005

APU_SQ2_LO

$4006

APU_SQ2_HI

$4007

APU triangle channel registers
APU_TRI_LINEAR

$4008

APU_TRI_LO

$400A

APU_TRI_HI

$400B

APU noise channel registers
APU DPCM channel registers
APU other registers
APU_SND_CHN

$4015

APU_CTRL

$4015

APU_STATUS

$4015

APU_FRAME

$4017

IO
Joypad registers
IO_JOY1

$4016 Joypad 1 address

IO_JOY2

$4017 Joypad 2 address

Button masks

See <buttons_1> variable

BTN_A

%10000000

BTN_B

%01000000

BTN_SELECT

%00100000

BTN_START

%00010000

BTN_UP

%00001000

BTN_DOWN

%00000100

BTN_LEFT

%00000010

BTN_RIGHT

%00000001

NMI
NMI vector control flags
NMI_DONE

%10000000 Signal that NMI has finish. Flag must be clear before another frame is process

NMI_FORCE

%01000000 Force NMI acknowledge

NMI_SCRL

%00010000 Send scroll data

NMI_PLT

%00001000 Send palette data

NMI_ATR

%00000100 Send Nametables attributes data

NMI_SPR

%00000010 Send sprites data

NMI_BKG

%00000001 Send background data

MMC5
MMC5 PRG banking mode

address: $5100

MMC5 CHR banking mode

address: $5101

MMC5 RAM protection registers
MMC5_RAM_PRO1

$5102

MMC5_RAM_PRO2

$5103

MMC5 Extended RAM mode

address: $5104

MMC5 Nametable mapping

address: $5105

7  bit  0
---- ----
DDCC BBAA
|||| ||||
|||| ||++- Select nametable at PPU $2000-$23FF
|||| ++--- Select nametable at PPU $2400-$27FF
||++------ Select nametable at PPU $2800-$2BFF
++-------- Select nametable at PPU $2C00-$2FFF
MMC5 Fill nametable registers
MMC5_FILL_TILE

$5106

MMC5_FILL_COL

$5107

MMC5 RAM Bank

address: $5113

MMC5 PRG banks control registers
MMC5_PRG_BNK0

$5114

MMC5_PRG_BNK1

$5115

MMC5_PRG_BNK2

$5116

MMC5_PRG_BNK3

$5117

MMC5 CHR banks control registers
MMC5_CHR_BNK0

$5120

MMC5_CHR_BNK1

$5121

MMC5_CHR_BNK2

$5122

MMC5_CHR_BNK3

$5123

MMC5_CHR_BNK4

$5124

MMC5_CHR_BNK5

$5125

MMC5_CHR_BNK6

$5126

MMC5_CHR_BNK7

$5127

MMC5_CHR_BNK8

$5128

MMC5_CHR_BNK9

$5129

MMC5_CHR_BNKA

$512A

MMC5_CHR_BNKB

$512B

MMC5_CHR_UPPER

$5130

MMC5 Vertical Split registers
MMC5_SPLT_MODE

$5200

MMC5_SPLT_SCRL

$5201

MMC5_SPLT_BNK

$5202

MMC5 IRQ Scanline counter
MMC5_SCNL_VAL

$5203

MMC5_SCNL_STAT

$5204

MMC5 multiplier registers
MMC5_MUL_A

$5205

MMC5_MUL_B

$5206

MMC5 Expansion RAM

address: $5C00

MMC5 RAM

address: $6000

Game
CLEAR TILE

Lower tile to use when clearing the screen

BTN TIMER

If used, number of frame before processing another input

PLAYER_SPRITE_BNK

CHR 1K bank where the player sprite is located

PLAYER_SPRITE

reserved sprite index for the player

FONT_CHR_BNK

Bank index of the default font

UI_CHR_BNK

upper char UI tiles containing dialog box tiles

GRAVITY

gravity acceleration applied to blue soul in sub-pixels

MAX_GRAVITY

maximum value of the gravity speed

JUMP_GRAVITY

gravity acceleration applied to blue soul in sub-pixels when performing a jump

JUMP_FORCE

speed added to y position when jumping

PLAYER_FLAG_DRAW_HP

Flag in player_flag , use to indicate that the player HP on the screen must be updated.

PLAYER_FLAG_DRAW_PLAYER

Flag in player_flag , use to indicate that a need to draw the player.

FIRST_HP_TILE

Upper left tile in CHR where HP bar tiles are located

TEXT_BUF_BNK

RAM bank index where decoded text data is located

VAR_RAM_BNK

RAM bank index where saved variables are located

Game - Soul
SOUL_TILE

CHR tile for drawing the player soul

SOUL_TILE

palette of the player soul

SOUL

  • MENU

  • RED

  • BLUE

  • FIGHT

  • WAIT

soul type that the player can take

Game - Dialog box
DIALOG_BOX_TILE_TL

Top left lower tile of the dialog box

DIALOG_BOX_TILE_TOP

Top lower tile of the dialog box

DIALOG_BOX_TILE_TR

Top right lower tile of the dialog box

DIALOG_BOX_TILE_LEFT

Left lower tile of the dialog box

DIALOG_BOX_TILE_MIDDLE

Middle lower tile of the dialog box

DIALOG_BOX_TILE_RIGHT

Right lower tile of the dialog box

DIALOG_BOX_TILE_BL

Bottom left lower tile of the dialog box

DIALOG_BOX_TILE_BOT

Bottom lower tile of the dialog box

DIALOG_BOX_TILE_BR

Bottom right lower tile of the dialog box

DIALOG_BOX_ANIM_TILE_X_OFFSET

starting lower tile for dialog box x animation

DIALOG_BOX_ANIM_TILE_Y_OFFSET

starting lower tile for dialog box y animation

DIALOG_BOX_SPRITE_TILE

lower tile for the dialog box corner sprite

Game - Char
CHAR
END

END of dialog

LB

Line Break

DB

Dialog Break

FDB

Force Dialog Break

TD

Toggle Dialog Box display

SET

Set flag

CLR

Clear flag

SAK

ShAKe

SPD

SPeeD

DL

DeLay

NAM

change NAMe of dialog box

FLH

FLasH

FAD

FADe in/out

SAV

Save the current text location

COL

change text COLor

RET

Return to the previous saved location

BIP

change dialog BIP effect

MUS

MUSic

SND

SouND effect

PHT

show PHoto

CHR

CHaRacter to show

ANI

character ANImation

BKG

change BacKGround

FNT

Change FoNT to use

JMP

JuMP to another dialog

ACT

jump to the selected choice (depending on the player ACTion)

BP

Background Palette

SP

Sprite Palette

POS

create new dialog box at POSition

SPA

change amount of space to add after LB

EVT

EVenT. Use to add control characters specific to the game

EXT

EXTension. Reserved to add more ctrl char to the dialog box

Game - Monster
MONSTER_VAR_SIZE

size of the monster variable array

EVENT
NONE

no event

START

event called when the fight start

TURN

event called when its the monster turn

CUSTOM

custom event

HIT

event called when the monster was hit

ACT

event called when the monster was act

ITEM

event called when the player use an item

SPARE

event called when the monster was spare

FLEE

event called when the player try to flee

MONSTER_IMG_BNK

Bank index where <monster_img_data> is located

MONSTER_CODE_BNK_BNK

Bank index where monster_code_bnk is located

MONSTER_CODE_STRUCT_BNK

Bank index where monster_code_struct is located

MONSTER_CODE_START_BNK

First bank index where monster code is located

MONSTER_STAT_BNK

Bank index where monster_stats_data is located

MONSTER_NAME_BNK

Bank index where monster_names_data is located

FIGHT_BNK

Bank index where fights is located

FIGHT_FLAG_N_MONSTER

Flag for the number of monster (0 to 3)

Hitbox
